title: Beyond Beauty: Botanical Motifs and Metaphors in Late Imperial China (2008)
description: The Chinese have traditionally imbued flowers, fruits, and woody grasses with rich and multilayered qualities that convey human aspirations, ideas, and values. This exhibition features 17th- and 18th-century ceramics, decorative arts, and paintings that illuminate the creative interplay between botanical images and human ideals.

input: Beyond Beauty: Botanical Motifs and Metaphors in Late Imperial China (2008)
